interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Marilyn Manson - The Early Years Review Date: 2014/11/02 Store: Marilyn Manson (Actor), M.W. Gacy (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Music Videos & Concerts Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Release date': 'January 15, 2008', 'Actors': 'Marilyn Manson, M.W. Gacy, Marilyn Manson and the Spooky Kids, Daisy Berkowitz, Gidget Gein', 'Studio': 'Candlelight', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: This video is about Marilyn Manson, but not made by him. It is ok, but not great. There are a few short commentaries, but the majority of the video is out takes from the bands very early start in super small venues. This DVD is not a blockbuster of information, but interesting nonetheless.

You can see it online on YouTube for what it is worth, but even the biggest MM fan doesn't need to own a copy of this one.

Your money could be better spent buying a copy of the Guns, God, Government tour on DVD. It is OH SO GOOD. The crowd & the band are loving this music.
Here is the link
http://www.amazon.com/Marilyn-Manson-Guns-Government-World/dp/B00005U2JL/ref=sr_1_20?ie=UTF8&qid=1414910304&sr=8-20&keywords=Marilyn+Manson Review Title: About Marilyn Manson, but not made by him Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Tara Stiles This is Yoga : 4 DVD Set : Complete Yoga Encyclopedia: Daily Yoga + Beginners Yoga + AM/PM Yoga + Complete Yoga Library for Everyone Tara Stiles (Actor), Darren Capik (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Contributor': 'Tara Stiles, Darren Capik', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Runtime': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 5 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Director': 'Darren Capik', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Run time': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tara Stiles', 'Studio': 'Watch It Now Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '4'} This is a great value and great series. I saw Tara on You Tube and loved her style.

All 4 of the DVD's are excellent. These are recorded in various venues. The atmospheres are minimalistic and there is no backgound music. Tara directs you through the poses in her earthy approach to yoga. She is beautiful, talented, and humble.

She studied ballet in her youth and it shows. She is so graceful. Thanks Tara for your beautiful Diva style of yoga!

She has a studio in NYC, if you live there or travel it would be fun to drop in for a class. She has lots of videos on You Tube, so check her out and get this DVD set if you like her style. Tara is the Diva of earthbound yoga with minimal ego {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Betty Thomas'], 'Producers': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Howard Stern', 'Robin Quivers', 'Mary McCormack'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} I must confess that I get a huge kick out of Howard, and I loved this movie. This is the real deal, a slice of how Howard got to be the King of All Media.

Even if you are not a big fan of Howard, you might still like seeing how he had to fight his way to the top of the pile against mainstream media and the FCC.

But if you are a fan of Howard, you will love this movie. His ex-wife Alison stars as herself, Robin as herself, Babbabooie as himself, and the very talented Fred as himself. The NBC exec (aka Pig Vomit) is very well done by Paul Giamotti.

You will get to see the very personal sensitive side of Howard on screen. Too fun, and too funny!

Although this is a 1997 film, it is still relevant today. A good slice of the 80's and how we listen to radio today.

I also bought the soundtrack because I love the Rob Zombie song The Great American Nightmare that starts off Howard's show. Here is the link, it is loads of fun too.
http://www.amazon.com/Private-Parts-Album-1997-Film/dp/B000002NCO/ref=cm_cr_pr_pb_t Hilarious from beginning to end {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Anthony C. Ferrante'], 'Producers': ['David Rimawi', 'Paul Bales', 'David Latt'], 'Starring': ['Tara Reid', 'Ian Ziering', 'John Heard'], 'Studio': ['The Global Asylum']} Whatever they spent on this movie, was WAY too much.

This might have been someone's college film project, then I would say good effort.

BAD movie. BAD acting. BAD CGI. In a word ... SUCKS.

Not even funny. Take a BIG pass on this sucker. BAD. Beyond a "B" Movie ... try "C" or "D" Movie {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Anthony C. Ferrante'], 'Producers': ['David Rimawi', 'Paul Bales', 'David Latt'], 'Starring': ['Tara Reid', 'Ian Ziering', 'John Heard'], 'Studio': ['The Global Asylum']} Whatever they spent on this movie, was WAY too much.

This might have been someone's college film project, then I would say good effort.

BAD movie. BAD acting. BAD CGI. In a word ... SUCKS.

Not even funny. Take a BIG pass on this sucker. Don't waste your precious time with this crap of a movie Marilyn Manson - Guns, God and Government World Tour Marilyn Manson (Actor, Director), Twiggy Ramirez (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Music Videos & Concerts ['Guns, God And Government Live In L.A. was filmed on the last night of the world tour in support of the Holy Wood album. When originally released on DVD in 2002, the visual footage of Guns, God And Government was taken from numerous concerts around the world during the tour, set to the audio soundtrack from the Los Angeles show. Now for the first time, this DVD presents the original high-definition L.A. footage and soundtrack together as a cohesive concert film. The spectacular staging, the costumes, the lighting and thecharismatic presence of Marilyn Manson himself combine to make this the ultimate live Marilyn Mansonrelease. / TRACK LISTING: 1) Irresponsible Hate Anthem 2) The Reflecting God 3) Great Big White World 4) Disposable Teens 5) The Fight Song 6) The Nobodies 7) Rock Is Dead 8) The Dope Show 9) Crucifiction In Space 10) Sweet Dreams (Are Made Of This) 11) The Love Song 12) Antichrist Superstar 13) The Beautiful People 14) Astonishing Panorama Of Endtimes 15) Lunchbox'] {'Genre': 'Music Videos & Concerts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Marilyn Manson, John 5, M.W. Gacy, Twiggy Ramirez, Ginger Fish', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Marilyn Manson', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 29, 2002', 'Actors': 'Marilyn Manson, Twiggy Ramirez, Ginger Fish, M.W. Gacy, John 5', 'Studio': 'Eagle Rock Ent', 'Number of discs': '1'} What a great concert montage! I almost felt like I was at the concert(s). MM is a perfectionist and attends to every single detail in his performances. You gotta love that in any performer.

Great editing from MM concerts worldwide on the Guns, God, Govt tour into one wonderful unique concert for this DVD. The sound is great, so plan on cranking it up LOUD.

I loved seeing the entire band play with reckless abandon. They all poured 110% into their performances. The costumes were great, lighting was perfect, special effects were terrific!

The Death Parade film is a behind the scenes look at the band which was fun, except I could have done without the temper tantrums.

I have watched this twice already this week, and I will be watching it many more times. WAY too much fun! LOVED IT>

BTW: This DVD is a "Must Have" for any MM fan! Wild reckless FUN! Marilyn Manson - The Early Years Marilyn Manson (Actor), M.W. Gacy (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Music Videos & Concerts {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Release date': 'January 15, 2008', 'Actors': 'Marilyn Manson, M.W. Gacy, Marilyn Manson and the Spooky Kids, Daisy Berkowitz, Gidget Gein', 'Studio': 'Candlelight', 'Number of discs': '1'} This video is about Marilyn Manson, but not made by him. It is ok, but not great. There are a few short commentaries, but the majority of the video is out takes from the bands very early start in super small venues. This DVD is not a blockbuster of information, but interesting nonetheless.

You can see it online on YouTube for what it is worth, but even the biggest MM fan doesn't need to own a copy of this one.

Your money could be better spent buying a copy of the Guns, God, Government tour on DVD. It is OH SO GOOD. The crowd & the band are loving this music.
Here is the link
http://www.amazon.com/Marilyn-Manson-Guns-Government-World/dp/B00005U2JL/ref=sr_1_20?ie=UTF8&qid=1414910304&sr=8-20&keywords=Marilyn+Manson About Marilyn Manson, but not made by him
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Fitness Orientation:** Strong interest in yoga and accessible, beginner-friendly exercise formats.
- **Content Preference:** Engages with video-based instructional content, especially yoga DVDs. Recent enjoyment of high-quality concert films indicates a broadening of media interests, paired with heightened expectations for quality storytelling. The user remains selective in film choices, leading to dissatisfaction with lower-quality productions.
- **Instructor Admiration:** Values relatable, down-to-earth instructors with a humble approach and appreciates elegance and grace in teaching style.
- **Atmosphere Preference:** Prefers minimalistic settings during workouts, avoiding distracting background music.
- **Media Consumption:** Actively engages with platforms like YouTube for yoga content and is increasingly discerning in media consumption, particularly in concert films that meet high entertainment quality standards. 
- **Valuation:** Seeks value in fitness and media purchases, correlating quality with the authenticity and reputation of instructors or performers, reflecting strong standards across all content.
- **Community Engagement:** Open to participating in yoga communities, including attending live classes in studios for a social aspect to their fitness interests.
- **New Interests:** Recent interactions reveal exploration into other music-related content, albeit with critical assessments, such as expressing that some films, while interesting, do not warrant ownership, and highlighting alternatives that exceed expectations. 

This user continues to exemplify a balanced approach to fitness and entertainment, emphasizing quality and enjoyment in all their choices.
